Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to enhance your daily experiences. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet high standards, ensuring it exceeds your expectations. Given its quality and features, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To make this opportunity available to you, I am offering it at an exclusive price of $150. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this exceptional deal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
